theReaper:ArcStrike.NAME: Arc Strike
theReaper:ArcStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. For every mark consumed deal that amount as additional damage.
theReaper:ArcStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. For every mark consumed deal [#FFBF00]twice[] that amount as additional damage.

theReaper:BloodAegis.NAME: Blood Aegis
theReaper:BloodAegis.DESCRIPTION: Remove all stacks of bleed from all creatures in the room. Gain block for each stack removed. NL Exhaust

theReaper:BloodMoon.NAME: Blood Moon
theReaper:BloodMoon.DESCRIPTION: Double the amount of thereaper:Marks applied. NL Applies !theReaper:M2! thereaper:Vengeance if you don't already have it. NL thereaper:Waning

theReaper:Bulwark.NAME: Bulwark
theReaper:Bulwark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust

theReaper:ChainStrike.NAME: Chain Strike
theReaper:ChainStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL ( !theReaper:M2! Damage, plus !M! Damage for every attack played this turn.

theReaper:Contagion.NAME: Contagion
theReaper:Contagion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! Damage every time you apply a debuff to an enemy

theReaper:CrimsonRush.NAME: Crimson Rush
theReaper:CrimsonRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If target is thereaper:bleeding deal !M! additional damage.

theReaper:CrystalRose.NAME: Crystal Rose
theReaper:CrystalRose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block when this card is drawn. NL Play to put this card on top of your draw pile. NL Ethereal

theReaper:Cyclone.NAME: Cyclone
theReaper:Cyclone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL Shuffle a Cyclone into your draw pile. NL Other Cyclones cost 0 this turn.

theReaper:DeathsDance.NAME: Death's Dance
theReaper:DeathsDance.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all [#FFBF00]Strikes[] by !M!

theReaper:DeathRattle.NAME: Death Rattle
theReaper:DeathRattle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL ( !M! Damage, plus !M! Damage for every !theReaper:M2! missing health ) NL Exhaust

theReaper:DeepCuts.NAME: Deep Cuts
theReaper:DeepCuts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Bleed on the attacked creature does not decrease this turn.

theReaper:Devour.NAME: Devour
theReaper:Devour.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, heal !M! percent of your max HP. NL Exhaust

theReaper:Effigy.NAME: Effigy
theReaper:Effigy.DESCRIPTION: Consume one soul. Add one copy of the next card you play into your hand. NL Exhaust
theReaper:Effigy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume any number of souls. Add that many copies of the next card you play into your hand. NL Exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have any souls to play this card.

theReaper:EnduringSpirit.NAME: Enduring Spirit
theReaper:EnduringSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL ( 5 Block, plus !M! Block for every !theReaper:M2! missing health ) NL Exhaust
theReaper:EnduringSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL ( 5 Block, plus !M! Block for every !theReaper:M2! missing health ) NL Exhaust NL Innate

theReaper:FeralInstincts.NAME: Feral Instincts
theReaper:FeralInstincts.DESCRIPTION: Deal double damage when you are at or below 25% Max Health.

theReaper:FeverDream.NAME: Fever Dream
theReaper:FeverDream.DESCRIPTION: Choose any number of souls to consume. Gain !M! energy for each soul consumed.

theReaper:FiendForm.NAME: Fiend Form
theReaper:FiendForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card by playing a card or soul, draw an extra card.

theReaper:Fracture.NAME: Fracture
theReaper:Fracture.DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from target creature. NL Deal !D! Damage

theReaper:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
theReaper:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Gain !theReaper:M2! thereaper:Vengeance. NL Exhaust

theReaper:Gambit.NAME: Gambit
theReaper:Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Reduce the cost of this card for each card drawn after turn start

theReaper:Glowfly.NAME: Glowfly
theReaper:Glowfly.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a small soul. NL Exhaust

theReaper:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
theReaper:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a creature dies, consume all their marks and heal for that amount.

theReaper:Hemoplague.NAME: Hemoplague
theReaper:Hemoplague.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play a card with thereaper:Bleed increase thereaper:Bleed on all cards by !M!.
theReaper:Hemoplague.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play a card with thereaper:Bleed increase thereaper:Bleed on all cards by !M!. NL Innate

theReaper:HiddenTalent.NAME: Hidden Talent
theReaper:HiddenTalent.DESCRIPTION: Draw the next Power in your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust NL Innate
theReaper:HiddenTalent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw the next two Powers in your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust NL Innate

theReaper:HurricaneStrike.NAME: Hurricane Strike
theReaper:HurricaneStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! times. NL Increase the number of hits by !theReaper:M2! this combat.

theReaper:Hyper.NAME: Hyper
theReaper:Hyper.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B] NL Add a Wound to your Discard. NL Exhaust
theReaper:Hyper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] [B] NL Add a Wound to your Discard.

theReaper:InsultToInjury.NAME: Insult To Injury
theReaper:InsultToInjury.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Discard any number of cards, deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

theReaper:Invigorate.NAME: Invigorate
theReaper:Invigorate.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card from the Exhaust pile NL Exhaust
theReaper:Invigorate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards from the Exhaust pile NL Exhaust

theReaper:Impatience.NAME: Impatience
theReaper:Impatience.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! random cards from your discard pile. NL Exhaust
theReaper:Impatience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! random cards from your discard pile. NL Exhaust

theReaper:Lacerate.NAME: Lacerate
theReaper:Lacerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Damage from attacks on the same enemy this turn apply !theReaper:B2! thereaper:Bleed

theReaper:MaimingStrike.NAME: Maiming Strike
theReaper:MaimingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! thereaper:Non-Lethal Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable

theReaper:Moonflower.NAME: Moonflower
theReaper:Moonflower.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain [B] [B] if this card is drawn after turn start and Exhaust.
theReaper:Moonflower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain [B] [B] [B] if this card is drawn after turn start and Exhaust.

theReaper:Reap.NAME: Reap
theReaper:Reap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! thereaper:Non-Lethal Damage. NL thereaper:SoulBind NL Exhaust

theReaper:Regroup.NAME: Regroup
theReaper:Regroup.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. You may put up to !theReaper:M2! card on top of your draw pile.
theReaper:Regroup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. You may put up to !theReaper:M2! cards on top of your draw pile.

theReaper:Papercut.NAME: Papercut
theReaper:Papercut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! Damage to all enemies every time you draw a card by playing a card or soul

theReaper:RiteoftheBlade.NAME: Rite of the Blade
theReaper:RiteoftheBlade.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal damage to all enemies.

theReaper:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard
theReaper:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL (Base !theReaper:M2! Block for each enemy in combat) NL Exhaust
theReaper:Safeguard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL (Base !theReaper:M2! Block, plus !theReaper:M2! Block for each enemy in combat) NL Exhaust

theReaper:SanguineArmour.NAME: SanguineArmour
theReaper:SanguineArmour.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. NL Gain !theReaper:SB! thereaper:Bleed

theReaper:ShadowStep.NAME: Shadow Step
theReaper:ShadowStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block each time you draw a card this turn. NL Exhaust
theReaper:ShadowStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block each time you draw a card this turn.

theReaper:ShieldWard.NAME: Shield Ward
theReaper:ShieldWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !theReaper:SB! thereaper:Bleed. NL Exhaust
theReaper:ShieldWard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !theReaper:SB! thereaper:Bleed. NL Innate NL Exhaust

theReaper:SoulBlade.NAME: Soul Blade
theReaper:SoulBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL ( Base !theReaper:M2! Damage, plus !M! Damage for each soul you possess.)

theReaper:Transfusion.NAME: Transfusion
theReaper:Transfusion.DESCRIPTION: Double all healing you receive this turn. NL Exhaust

theReaper:Vampirism.NAME: Vampirism
theReaper:Vampirism.DESCRIPTION: Heal an extra !M! hp every time you gain health this combat.

theReaper:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theReaper:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theReaper:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theReaper:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theReaper:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theReaper:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theReaper:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theReaper:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theReaper:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theReaper:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theReaper:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theReaper:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theReaper:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
